segments.text: I observe the kitchen with its cabinets and counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman stands drying a plate attentively.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron suggests she's in homemaker mode.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the sink behind her is a waterfall of water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances precariously on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His reach into the jar looks triumphant.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl anticipates her treat with wide eyes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the wet floor adds danger to their game.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman's obliviousness is almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, it could lead to a bad fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tidy garden outside mocks the indoor disarray.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a lively, if risky, family moment.
segments.speaker: PAR
